{{wikipedia|Kinpira}}

===Etymology===
By analogy from {{m|ja|坂田金平}}, a [[puppet show]] character of the early Edo Period known for his strength, stubbornness, and valor, due to the strength and stubbornness of [[burdock]], traditionally the main ingredient in ''kinpira''.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|きんぴら}}

# a Japanese dish that involves [[saute]]ing and simmering root vegetables such as carrot, burdock root, and/or lotus root
